issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

comments.body:
*ROOT-CAUSE:*

{{UpdateInputAccessTimeHook$PreExec}} did not take into account that table or partition could be in other DB, different from the current.

*SOLUTION:*

Add DB name info while updating last access time for table or partition.
[~osayankin] could you also add/extend a qtest to cover your use case? ([updateAccessTime.q|https://github.com/apache/hive/blob/master/ql/src/test/queries/clientpositive/updateAccessTime.q])

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:

ATTACHMENT ID: 12897547 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build
[~osayankin] I think UpdateInputAccessTimeHook is undertested; could you add a test for this use case?

Hi [~osayankin],
what is the status of this patch? Is only the q test update missing or are there other pending works on this patch?
Thanks and regards,
Marta

Hi [~kuczoram].

The issue is fixed, and we need q tests here only.
[~osayankin],Â do you have plans/time to create the q test? If you don't have time, I am happy to help out.

Well the only thing I need here is how to obtain q.out file for the test (expected output). The rest is rather simple: STR above is an ideal  test-case. 
Do you know about that? I will appreciate your help and then add the test-case.
